Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: M. Dunlap
Reviews.Content: Without going into every detail of the camera I'll simply say 'I love it'.  Exactly what I wanted with large touch screen, a lens the never is in the way, simple to use, easy to carry, and I love the special features built in.  I've found that using the natural/flash simultaneous exposure feature is awesome.  I use it quite often when taking indoor photos and often times find a significant difference between the two photos.  I only have a couple of cautions with this camera (and these are human error issues).  First, be careful and don't get your finger in the photo.  Secondly, use the strap.  It's a very compact and slim camera and therefore has a little more potential for dropping.  That's all the 'negatives' I have about the camera and honestly those aren't about the camera, that's the operator!

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera
Reviews.Author: T Man
Reviews.Content: after a long decision i decided to go with this camera i am very very impressed with it although i would buy a backup battery just to have it around because it usually dies after about 350-400 pics all around though i am really impressed

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Drea
Reviews.Content: Brought this camera for my Canada trip in 2011. It is very simple to use and compact enough for effortless travel. I am partial to Fuji FinePix brand cameras so this is a basis opinion...

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: MsB
Reviews.Content: This camera is very easy to use.  It takes beautiful pictures.  The only issue I have is that if you carry it in your pocket, it tends to turn itself on.  The camera activates by sliding the panel off the lens.  This happens often when carried in a pocket.  I purchased it because it's small and I wanted to be able to have it on hand.  Now I have to be careful where I carry it so it doesn't turn on accidentally.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Desert Shopper
Reviews.Content: My nine year old bought this camera with money he saved from his birthday.  He's used it for 4 months now and still likes it as much today as he did when he got it.  His favorite feature is the touch screen menu display.He likes that he can name his pictures, lock them to prevent deletion, and create picture albums.  He likes to search by date to find pictures he took on that date.  He has played with the film simulation to take pictures with sepia or black and white with decent results.  The picture quality is better than I thought it would be...especially considering he is a young user without camera usage training.It seems to be pretty intuitive because he hasn't expressed any frustration with the menu navigation and I know he has not read the manual.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: mimmim
Reviews.Content: this camera is very easy to use (i am electronically challenged) and takes great pics. we bought it as an upgrade from an older fuji model and are very happy with this purchase. my father always bought fuji cameras and i following his foot steps.i give it an AAA+

Reviews.Title: Nice and compact
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I wanted a good camera that was small so I could keep it on me at all times.  This camera fit the bill nicely.  While it is great for outside shots, it necessarily is limited by it's flash for inside shots.

Reviews.Title: Not good photo quality
Reviews.Author: KRB
Reviews.Content: This camera has the best features and design that I have seen on a point and shoot, but after a month of use I did not have one image that was not either blurry or grainy.  No matter what adjustments I made, I was unable to take a photo even close to the quality of a standard 35 mm; so I returned the camera.

Reviews.Title: Good, but...
Reviews.Author: P. Haikov "Old guy"
Reviews.Content: Good image quality if you know what to do. The manual is very bad!Ultra compact, very fast auto-focus, you can have it in the pocket for the right moment!But, the starting screen takes the precious seconds and the moment often lost... This is my main complain!!!Also, the glossy screen is very hard to see in the bright light!Otherwise I like this camera!

Reviews.Title: Nice Pocket Camera
Reviews.Author: William SNYDER
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice pocket camera to have when your SLR is not at hand. The EXR technology works well in most situations. The touch screen is nice but may take some getting use to.

ProductInfo.Features:
12-megapixel resolution with EXR technology; Fujinon 5x Zoom
3.5-inch wide (16:9) touch-screen LCD
HD movies at 720p with sound
Hybrid High Speed AF; Intelligent Image Stabilization
Capture images and video to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix Z800EXR 12 MP Digital Camera with 5x Periscopic Optical Zoom and 3.5-Inch Touch-Screen LCD (Black)
